DOC.brief_title: Fear Childbirth ( Tokophobia ) - Etiology , Essence Clinical Implications
DOC.detailed_description: Fear childbirth ( Tokophobia ) inconsistently define research literature : define anxiety disorder often define form phobia ; regard pre-pregnancy period , regard anxiety pregnancy focus labor process . Despite high prevalence ( 13 % -20 % fertile woman ) , research area scarce current finding incohesive due various conceptualization phenomenon various measurement method .
